PERSONA:
juan is a 55-year-old white, non-hispanic man living in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. he was born in another country but has lived in the u.s. for over 21 years. juan never married and identifies as a roman catholic, though he seldom attends religious services.

educationally, juan is a high school graduate with no further formal education. he earns a middle-class income of less than $30,000 per year. politically, juan considers himself an independent voter who leans towards the republican party and holds conservative views.

juan is an active internet user, going online several times a day. however, he does not engage in any regular volunteer work. despite being eligible, juan is not a registered voter.

overall, juan is a middle-aged, foreign-born man living a modest life in an urban area of the southern u.s. while not particularly religious, he maintains his catholic identity and conservative political leanings.
